# comment

## Summary

Provide consumers with comments by the creator of the Element about the Element.


## Description

A comment is an optional field for creators of the Element to provide comments
to the readers/reviewers of the document.


## Metadata

- name: comment
- Nature: DataProperty
- Range: xsd:string
